slide1: Enter the map menu and select an available charging station.
slide2: Connect the required charging connector to the electric vehicle and press the button in the “Start charging” application.
slide3: Wait until the charging session ends or end it early in the app. Disconnect the charging cable from the electric vehicle.
slide4: You can view charge statistics in the “History” menu section.
как-найти-зарядную-станцию: How to find a charging station?
перейти-на-карту-выбрать-станцию-выбрать: Go to map - select station - select outlet
где-ознакомиться-с-информацией-по-прошлы: Where can I find information about past charging sessions?
профиль: Find out the status of the balance. Change application settings. Contact the technical service
зарядной-сессии-заглушка: Go to the map, select a station, then an outlet and start the charging session.
Для просмотра истории необходимо авториз: To view the history, you need to log in
неудалось_закончить_зарядку: FAILED TO END THE CHARGING SESSION
хотите_удалить_аккаунт: Do you want to delete your account?
